p: However, a recent study about the origin and evolution of Citrus based on the total genome shows higher similarities with the volatile profiles here summarized. Our HCA clustered C. sinensis, C. paradisi and C. aurantium with C. reticulata and C. grandis ( C. maxima). In fact, Wu et al. (2018) showed that the first three species are actually genetical hybrids and admixtures of the latter two. This genomic study also revealed that C. aurantifolia is a hybrid of C. medica. In accordance with this, our HCA based on the volatile profile of the fruit peel also clustered them together.
